title: Q&A on Combating Laziness and Getting Silicon Valley’s Attention
description: Tom Bilyeu (@tombilyeu) and Cindy (@essenceofcin) answer questions directly from the Impact Theory community. Topics covered in this Q&A session include: ►How to get Silicon Valley’s attention from a third world country ►The best way to raise $1M ►The negative impacts of a lack of sleep ►How to develop a methodology for executing on your dreams ►Why Tom drinks Snapple despite advocating a healthy lifestyle ►How to overcome and combat extreme laziness to win the battle for your mind ►The plans Impact Theory has for making and distributing comic books and graphic novels ►Plus more! Tom Bilyeu is the co-founder of 2014 Inc. 500 company Quest Nutrition — a unicorn startup valued at over $1 billion — and the co-founder and host of Impact Theory. Impact Theory is a first-of-its-kind company designed to facilitate global change through the incubation of mission-based businesses and the cultivation of empowering content. Every piece of content Impact Theory creates is meant to underscore the company mission to free people from The Matrix and help them unlock their true potential. Impact Theory exists to inspire the next generation of game-changing companies and creators that will make a true and lasting impact on the world.
